title: Indoor-Outdoor Living and Entertaining Are a Breeze at This Architectural Ranch in Ojai
text:
Listing of the Day

Location: Ojai, California

Price: $9.25 million

On a secluded road in the foothills of Ojai stands this sprawling architectural ranch offering indoor-outdoor living in the serene California countryside.

Despite its current contemporary appearance, however, the home was once a "forgettable, typical ‘Grandma Suzy’ ranch," said listing agent Ernie Carswell of Douglas Elliman. "It was just so typical—straight out of an equestrian magazine."

Today, due to an extensive renovation, the ranch casts a strikingly modern appearance with a gunmetal grey façade that belies the traditional white clapboard exterior that once graced its walls. Inside, the home maintains this sense of modernity with an open-concept layout that features polished wood floors, contemporary cabinetry, and expansive sliding glass doors that seamlessly open to the outside.

"It feels like a nightclub destination," Mr. Carswell said of the newly updated ranch. A chef’s kitchen with eye-catching black marble countertops, contemporary kitchen appliances and white marble-clad bathrooms complete the image of a trendy California retreat.

More: A Car-Lover’s Home Lists in Beverly Hills for $45 Million

The home’s open layout and indoor-outdoor design ensure it is ideal for entertaining. With an expansive back deck and a pool surrounded by lounge chairs, Mr. Carswell asserted the home "is set up like a party scene or resort."

For those hoping to use the time away from the city to relax on a ranch, Mr. Carswell keenly noted that the overall property size is large enough to raise chickens and ride horses, but small enough to not require extensive upkeep.

"This is the ‘Pop Star Ranch,’ he said. "It qualifies as a ranch, but it’s not nearly the maintenance, upkeep and cost of maintaining a ranch."

It "is really a beautiful escape for someone who does want to get out of L.A," he said.

More: Betsey Johnson Lists Paradise Cove Mobile Home for $1.95 Million

Stats

Standing on 4.3 acres of land, the 4,635-square-foot contemporary ranch features five bedrooms and six bathrooms.

Amenities

Thanks to its recent renovation and unique location, the residence includes a range of both luxury and ranch-appropriate amenities. While the residence itself includes a chef’s kitchen, a detached guest house and an outdoor swimming pool, the property features scenic landscaping, large grounds for horses, and even two fruit-bearing orchards.

From Penta: Banksy’s ‘Devolved Parliament’ Heading to Auction Prior to Brexit Day

Neighborhood Notes

The house is located Northwest of Los Angeles in Ojai, a small city in a bucolic valley of the same name. Here, residents and visitors hoping to escape the bustle of the city can enjoy meditative retreats and scenic hiking trails alongside local wineries, boutique stores and relaxed restaurants.

Agent: Ernie Carswell, Douglas Elliman
